field.description: if yes, each js will be put in separate tag with it's own id. good for optimization plugins

field.description: Show "Edit HTML" button in elementor panel widget settings

field.description: Disable font awesome from loading from the plugin in all widgets. Sometimes good for optimization.

field.description: Sort the order of the attributes in widgets editor alphabetically

field.label: Enable Changelog
field.description: Enable changelog for widgets

field.name: enable_revisions
field.label: Enable Revisions
field.description: Enable revisions in widgets editor

field.name: google_connect_desc
field.label: Used in Google services (Google Sheets) related widgets for reading and writing data.

field.name: google_api_key
field.label: Google API Key
field.description: Used in Google services (Calendar, Places, Sheets, YouTube etc.) related widgets for reading data. Read this article for instructions.

field.name: google_map_key
field.label: Google Map API Key
field.description: Used to output a map in Google Maps related widgets. Read this article for instructions.

field.name: openweather_api_key
field.label: OpenWeather API Key
field.description:
Used in weather related widgets. Read this article for instructions.
It takes some time for an API key to become active. Read error 401 description for more details.

field.name: exchangerate_api_key
field.label: Exchange Rate API Key
field.description: Used in currency exchange related widgets. Get your API key here.

field.name: wpml_button
field.label: Check widgets fields that are ready for wpml automatic translation.

field.name: enable_form_entries
field.label: Enable Form Entries
field.description: Enable viewing and saving of form submissions.

field.name: save_form_logs
field.label: Save Form Logs
field.description: Enable saving a log of form submissions.

field.name: form_antispam_enabled
field.label: Enable Anti-spam
field.description: Enable anti-spam to protect forms.

field.name: form_antispam_submissions_limit
field.label: Submissions Limit
field.description: Specify the maximum number of submissions a user can reach in the time interval. The default value is 3.

field.name: form_antispam_submissions_period
field.label: Submissions Period
field.description: Specify within how many seconds a user will reach the submissions limit. The default value is 60 seconds.

field.name: form_antispam_block_period
field.label: Block Period
field.description: Specify how many minutes a user will be blocked from submitting forms after reaching the limit. The default value is 180 minutes.

field.name: email_test_button
field.label: Send a test email to check your SMTP configuration.

field.name: memory_limit_text_desc
field.label: In case of insufficient memory, you can increase WordPress memory limit wp config file (wp-config.php)

field.name: enable_memory_usage_test
field.label: Enable Memory Usage Test
field.description:
Use it when you have some memory crash.
When enabling it it will log every addon and field register operation
and sugniffically slow down the editor work. Use it only for testing and turn it off after.

field.name: memory_usage_button
field.label:
Show last memory usage log
Run it after the editor run with the memory test

field.name: disable_post_content_filters
field.label: Disable post content output filters
field.description: Sometimes post content filters causing memory errors. Disabling them can make the page load in case stucked pages

field.name: show_php_error
field.label: Show PHP Error Message
field.description: Use it when you see some text about php error and want to see it.

field.name: enable_display_errors_ajax
field.label: Enable Display Errors on Ajax
field.description: Enable display PHP errors and notices on ajax request.

field.name: disable_deprecated_warnings
field.label: Disable Deprecated Warnings
field.description: Disable deprecated warnings in wordpress on plugin load. Usefull sometimes to make things load, please turn it off after test.

field.name: text_overload_button
field.label:
Test the server for overload bug,
run this test when the edit page get stuck for any reason
when the unlimited elements plugin is on.

field.name: text_connectivity_button
field.label: Test the api connectivity. Run it if you don't see any widgets inside the widgets catalog

field.name: text_phpinfo_button
field.label: Show the phpinfo - php server configuration table

field.name: text_globals_button
field.label: Show the global variables of the plugin, like base url and path
